text: Bousta is a settlement on Mainland, in Shetland, Scotland. Bousta is situated in the parish of Walls and Sandness. Scott's Hawkweed is native to the pastures west of Bousta. Barnacle geese have been observed at Bousta, as well as seals. ==References== ==External links== *Canmore - Muckle Bousta site record *Canmore - Little Bousta, Norse Mill site record Category:Villages in Mainland, Shetland
title: Bousta
